name: Felix Says (Simon)
description: A game based on the class memory game 'Simon'. 'Felix Says' features Felix the black cat, who meows the sequence for the player to repeat on their own 'Simon' game look-alike.

name: Theme Generator
description: A full-stack full-CRUD application that allows users to generate styles for their applications using just a description. 'Theme Generator' utilizes OpenAI to generate styles and allows users to preview styles and use the generated properties for their own applications.
